In England, in the seven days to 01 July, there were 134,680 new confirmed cases (239.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 June, there were 78,067 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 73% (56,613 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 July is 4,307,618 (7,653 cases per 100,000 population).
